unnormalised: JEE vo NEET sarkhya spordha poriksheo foddpak Everest konddyacher choddlear koxem dista, barem? khas korun syllabus itlo vhodd asun ani spordha dor vorsak odik kathinn zata ten'na. thoim coaching centre yetat. aizkal FIITJEE ani Aakash sarkhim vhodd namvam asat, toxench lhan, sthanik coaching classes-ui asat. sarkhi ek nivddak tumchea borem gunn mellounche sandhek ozbilpnna puro aassakta. mhoji cousin, Rohan-an pattlea vorsak JEE coaching cher dhyan divnk tanchem board porikshechi toyyari dhir kaddli.
normalised: J-E-E vo N-E-E-T sarkhya spordha porixaanchi tayari korop mhanllear Mount Everest choddtta toxem dista, nõi? Khas korun syllabus itlo vishal asta ani spordha dor vorosa kathin zata mhunnon. Thoim coaching center kamak yetat. Aizkaal F-I-I-T-J-E-E ani Aakash sarkhya vhoddlea naamaankoddenlean lhan, sthanik coaching class meren dher viklp asat. Yogya ekachi nivodd korop tumchea boro score kaddpache sandik gambhir porinnam korunk xakta. Mhojem cousin, Rohan-an, fattlim voros fokot J-E-E coaching-acher dhyan divpak tachi board porixechi tayari adim keli.

unnormalised: vhodd vichar-vicharanchi ek asl'lim mhanllear class 10vi uprant coaching centeran bhorti zanvchem vo 11vi poriant ravchem. kedanch suru kelear tumkam adhikai melltta mhunn kaim zannank dista. tankam dista ki tem vistrut syllabus purai korpak tumkam purnn vell diita. her zann bhavddtat ki tem zaitich pressur zata xigrim. tankam suchoita ki poile board porikshecher dhyan divchem. plus, coaching feesui sust nasli; Aakash tanchea medical pravesh karyakromak dor vorsa ₹2,00,000 gheta.
normalised: Ek vhodd dvidha mhanllear class dhaivintlean zoddlea uprant coaching center-ak mellop vo ekvint meren ravop. Thodde zann mantaat ki veglench suruvaat korop tuka ek dhadd dita. Tankam dista ki tenntlean tuka vishal syllabus puro korpak purto vell melltta. Dusre vataavron kortaat ki tenntlean khupoch dabdab asta. Te poile tumchea board porixecher dhyan divpak sangatat. Ani, coaching fee-i sukat nhõi; Aakash tankam medical pravesh karyakrama khatir rupiya don lakh dor voros gheta.

unnormalised: ani magir online ani offline vadacho vixo. covid uprant online coaching chodd lokpriy zalam. vedantu ani byju's sarkhea platforms live classes, record kel'le lectures ani poripurnn practice material diitat. tem sust ani sadharanponnan odik podvoddi asat. mhaji ixtt, priya, unacademycher xirapti gheta. ti mhonnta ki tanche dout-clear korpacheo sessions ek zinn rakhpi asat. dusre vatten, offline coaching tumkam klas-room-achem vatavaran ani xikxokam sangatim direct sampork diita. kaim vidhyarthi khorench tea vatavaran vantto ghetat.
normalised: Uprant online virudh offline bahas asa. C-O-V-I-D uprant online coaching khup lokpriya zalam. Vedantu ani Byju's sarkhi platforms live classes, record kel'le bhashonna, ani dher prashn dil'le shiktuk vastu dita. Tenntlean sopek zata ani zaite pavtim odik posaayek asta. Mhoji ixttinn, Priya, Unacademy-chi xapath gheta. Ti sangta ki tankam sounshoy nivarttavpacho sessions ek jivank ravovpi astaa. Dusrekodden, offline coaching, tuka tem classroom-achem vatavorn ani shikshakankodden ubhech samvad dita. Thodde vidhyarthi khorench tya vattavronant vikasit zataat.

unnormalised: punn zannvai zatat, coaching ek jaduchem golli nhoi. tumchean svota: khatin porixram korpak zai. ektthim ravpachim sovo, niyamit sudharnni, ani mock test gorjechim. coaching classes sadharanponnan vostovik poriksha patternacher adharit mock tests kortat. mhunnge, tatpurti ek santulan soddun kaddop. tumchea coaching center diupi resources vaprat punn tankacher purai dhyaan dovru naka. svotachean addhyon korun ghenvchen odik mhotvachem. vostovik poriksha zatiche poile sogllea mock testant 75% gunn melloupacho hetu dovrat.
normalised: Punn saty sang, coaching ek jaduchi guli nhõi. Tunvem apleakoch kathin kam korunk zai. Satatyaancheo shiktuk sovoi, niyomit punraveekshanna, ani mock tests mahatvache asat. Coaching classes sadharnnponni vastavik porixechea patternacher adharit mock tests kortat. Mhunnge, mukhy tanki mhanllear santulan sodun kaddop. Tumchea coaching center-an dil'leo sampotti vaprat, punn tankam purem visarop naka. Apleachem shikop azoo khup mahatvachem asa. Vastavik porixekodden adim sogllea mock tests-ant sattar pacchottar score korpak dhyeas dhora.

unnormalised: nimanne, borem coaching center mhanllear je tumchea vyaktik addhyon xailik ani gorjenk melltta tem. fattir kudd'ddepan tumchea ixtt kiteak kortat tem follow koru naka. bore bhaxen shodh layat, choltoch vidhyarthiyam sangatim uloyat, ani zait tor nirnnoi ghevche poile ek demo class-ui attend karat. ugddas dovrat, tem vell ani dublleanchi ek vhodd gunthovnnuk, mhunnun chodd tankayen nivddat! tumchea poriksheak shubhechcha, tumchean tem korunk zatam!
normalised: Nimanne, ut'tom coaching center mhanllear tem ji tumchea vegllea shiktuk style ani zaruank uygunn asta. Tumchea ixttan kartat tem andhdhhponnan fovo naka. Boren porikxa korat, vortoman vidhyartyankodden uloat, ani zait zalear nirnay gheitlea adim ek demo class-ak mellat. Ugddas dovorat, tem vell ani poisaanchem ek mahatvachem guntovnuk asa, mhunnge xanneach nivodd korat! Tumchea porixechea porinnamank shubhechha, tumchea lagim assa hem!
